Accelerate.definition: to bring about at an earlier time
Accelerate.origin: [held that the creditor's right to was suspended "J. J. White and R. S. Summers"]

-atÂ·ing.definition: to bring about at an earlier time

sub_terms.a: to advance (the maturity date of a security agreement) so that payment of the debt in full is due immediately see also
sub_terms.b: to cause (a future interest in property) to vest by removing the preceding interests (as by failure or premature termination)to enforce an acceleration clause [held that the creditor's right to was suspended "J. J. White and R. S. Summers"]
